Title: Provides pregnant persons with alternative birth choices to preserve the life of a fetus when electing to have an abortion
Summary: Provides pregnant persons with alternative birth choices to preserve the life of a fetus when electing to have an abortion by health care practitioners offering sedated birth and perinatal hospice procedures.
LawCode: Amd ยง2599-bb, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing pregnant persons with alternative birth choices to preserve the life of a fetus when electing to have an abortion
